title: Choose an Expression
speech: Let  u is equal to 1 plus, 2 x cubed, , so  d u is equal to, 6 x squared d x .

title: Choose an Expression
text: Since the original function includes one factor of $$x^2$$ and $$du=6x^2 dx$$, multiply both sides of the du equation by $$\frac{1}{6}$$.
speech: Since the original function includes one factor of  x squared  and  d u is equal to 6 x squared d x , multiply both sides of the du equation by  1 sixth .

title: Adjust the Limits of Integration
text: To adjust the limits of integration, note that when $$x=0$$, $$u=1+2\left(0\right)=1$$, and when $$x=1$$, $$u=1+2\left(1\right)=3$$.
speech: To adjust the limits of integration, note that when  x is equal to 0 ,  u, is equal to, 1 plus 2 times 0, is equal to 1 , and when  x, is equal to 1 ,  u, is equal to, 1 plus 2 times 1, is equal to 3 .

,   u, is equal to, 1 plus 2 times 0, is equal to 1
, and when   x, is equal to 1
,   u, is equal to, 1 plus 2 times 1, is equal to 3

title: Adjust the Limits of Integration
text: What is the result of adjusting the limits of integration?
